views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 11

Switches is a suite of UISwitch replacements allowing you to replace the boring old stock iOS switches with something new. With over 15 different switches and more to come, there are plenty of options. Check out the screenshots!

After installing, purchase is done via PayPal in the tweaks settings. From there you can select your preferred switch style and respring. Your new switch style should now be overriding the default one!

Configure options from Settings.
